original_text: But he that heareth, and doeth not, is like a man that without a foundation built an house upon the earth; against which the stream did beat vehemently, and immediately it fell; and the ruin of that house was great.
korean_text: 듣고 행하지 아니하는 자는 주추 없이 흙 위에 집 지은 사람과 같으니 탁류가 부딪치매 집이 곧 무너져 파괴됨이 심하니라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: But he that heareth, and doeth not
is like a man that without a foundation
built an house upon the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 땅 위에 집을 지은 사람과 같다

sentences.original_text: against which the stream did beat vehemently
and the ruin of that house was great
